title: Tech softball opens OVC play Saturday at UT Martin - Tennessee Tech
content: Tech softball opens OVC play Saturday at UT Martin  Tennessee Tech
description:
MARTIN, Tenn. – The 2022 season has had a great start for the Tennessee Tech softball team, taking a 17-6 record through the first month of the campaign and rifling off eight straight victories. 

It’s an interesting thought – especially with the Golden Eagles picked seventh in the Ohio Valley Conference preseason poll – on just where the Tech squad could prove themselves to be. 

OVC play begins this weekend and the Golden Eagles make a trek over to UT Martin with a single game on Saturday and a doubleheader on Sunday, giving Tech an opportunity to show just what they’re capable of.
